attributes.action: Discount the votes of Scotland and Wales in electing a Government in Westminster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To put the title into English; I think it is extremely unfair and undemocratic how the current government which I (an englishman) voted against is only in power because of Scotland and Wales giving them an overall majority. Scotland and Wales have their own Governments so their votes should influence who is power in Westminster. Only English votes should count towards Westminster.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
